Summary: various white flashing lights followed by orange orbs and triangle mother ship 2 city blocks long
divs: sighting detailsthursday evening i received a phone call from a friend informing me to look outside. i witnessed an amazing show. the entire sky was filled with flashing white specs throughout the sky numbering close to a hundred. this was followed by the appearance of 30 to 40 large orange orbs that after 10 or so seconds disappeared. the transition from white flashes to orange orbs continued in various positions in the sky for about 2 hours.towards the end of the night a triangularly shaped red light formation appeared,however this was much,much,much different. this object was approximately 40 feet tall and i would estimate at its widest point at least a 1\4 mile wide.truly amazing and scary at the same time.each point of the triangle had its own red light and the ship flew with no sound and only 100-200 feet off the ground over houses and out towards the beach.the flashing white lights and orange orbs are very common in my area and no-one knows anything. hundreds of videos uploaded on youtube and nothin. hope this wakes the masses.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Calabash
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
